origin.voile.test.name: Test
origin.voile.test.description: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
power.voile.zombie_arms.name: Zombie Arms Example
power.voile.zombie_arms.description: You point your arms forward like a zombie, except when sneaking.
power.voile.bees_ignore.name: Modify Behavior Example
power.voile.villager_enemy.name: Modify Behavior Example 2
power.voile.villager_enemy.description: Makes villagers scared of you and golems hostile towards you.
power.voile.enderman_stare.name: Modify Behavior Example 3
power.voile.enderman_stare.description: Prevent endermen from getting angry if you stare at them.
power.voile.undead_friends.name: Modify Behavior Example 4
power.voile.undead_friends.description: Undead mobs are neutral towards you.
power.voile.burning_moon.name: Moon Phase Example
power.voile.burning_moon.description: You burn during a full moon at night.
power.voile.bonus_damage.name: Enchantability Example
power.voile.bonus_damage.description: You deal bonus damage with gold tools.
power.voile.big.name: Modify Scale Example
power.voile.big.description: You are taller than a regular player.
power.voile.change_resource_with_effects: Change Resource With Status Effects Example
Every beneficial status effect increases the resource by two.
power.voile.anvil_feet.name: Modify Footstep Sound Example
power.voile.anvil_feet.description: You make an anvil sound when you walk.
power.voile.hurt_sound.name: Modify Hurt Sound Example
power.voile.hurt_sound.description: You make a ghast noise when you get hurt.
power.voile.death_sound.name: Modify Death Sound Example
power.voile.weak_to_smite.name: Enchantment Vulnerability Example
power.voile.weak_to_smite.description: You are weak to Smite as if you were undead.
power.voile.reverse_instant_effects.name: Reverse Instant Effects Example
power.voile.reverse_instant_effects.desc: Instant effects are reversed on you.
power.voile.instant_effect_immunity.name: Instant Effect Immunity Example
power.voile.instant_effect_immunity.desc: You are immune to Instant Health when it's not a full moon.
power.voile.convert_chickens_to_cows.des: You convert chickens to cows upon killing them.
power.voile.inaccurate_projectiles.name: Modify Divergence Example
power.voile.no_particles.name: Prevent Sprinting Particles Example
power.voile.no_particles.description: Sprinting particles do not appear while it's raining.
power.voile.disable_shield.name: Disable Shield Example
power.voile.disable_shield.description: You can press use on a player to disable their shield.
power.voile.disable_shields.name: Disable Shields Example
power.voile.disable_shields.description: Your attacks disable shields while under the effect of Strength.
power.voile.craftable_items.name: Craftable Example
power.voile.craftable_items.description: You can't pick up items that are craftable.
power.voile.knock_back_attacker.name: Action On Block Example
power.voile.knock_back_attacker.descript: When blocking with a shield, you knock back the attacker.
power.voile.no_food_slowdown.name: Prevent Item Slowdown Example
power.voile.no_food_slowdown.description: Eating food does not slow you down.
power.voile.water_breathing.name: Water Breathing Example
power.voile.water_breathing.description: You can breathe underwater during the night.
power.voile.nearby_boats.name: Nearby Entities Example
power.voile.random_negative_effect.name: Apply Random Effect Example
power.voile.random_negative_effect.descr: You get a random negative status effect every time you take fall damage.
